item.title: DIY Reactive Model Store using RxJava
item.description: In the last few years on Android, we’ve seen an explosion of architectures based on the idea of a unidirectional data flow. I was first exposed to this idea while working on an MVI-based app using RxJava. One of the key concepts in MVI is to cleanly manage changes to your appication’s state. Working with Immutable State So, what does our Model Store do, exactly? It keeps a copy of an immutable state.
